title: Emerald Lakshmi Chandbali - Pancharatna Shobha
features: Intricately crafted Chandbali design featuring a central emerald surrounded by glittering CZ stones. The traditional Karnaphool shape is accentuated with delicate pearl drops, adding a touch of sophistication and vintage charm. The gold is finished with a Hyderabadi polish for a rich, lustrous shine.
occasions: and other traditional Telugu ceremonies. Also suitable for grand evening events and celebrations.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The vibrant emeralds and sparkling CZ stones catch the light beautifully, making these earrings a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. The Chandbali design carries cultural significance and is a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. High-quality materials ensure lasting value.
